By using Dark, Electric, and Steel Gems the Black Flute increases the player's Item Drop Rate. == Details == Black Flute increases the player's Item Drop Rate by a base 2%. The Base effect is multiplied by the players Achievement Bonus, to a current maximum of 18%, with an achievement bonus of 800%.
